args:
With Pecorine unconscious after using all her
strength in battle, the others try to figure out
how to help her. Cleo and Mitsuba eventually
realize Pecorine might recover if she is able to
eat, so they set out to hunt some fiends and use
their meat in a rice porridge.
In the forest near the Memoria Caverns...
Sorry, but these are all the medicines I\nhave at the moment. Fiends have been\ncutting off supply lines, you see.
This is a good start. Thank you.
You're staying over at the inn, yes?\nI hope that girl with you gets better.
I fear my healing magic can do no more...
Ah, welcome back, Mitsuba.\nWere you able to procure medicine?
Yeah, but they didn't have much.\nHow's our girl doing?
I was able to heal her wounds,\nbut she remains unconscious.
What HAPPENED to her in that fight?
I've tried everything I can think of,\nbut she shows no signs of waking.\nPerhaps she never will.
She's asking the Box of Hope for aid.\nLikely she wants to bring something from\nanother world that can help Pecorine.
That's right. Pecorine helped me,\nso now I have to return the favor.
Pecorine gave all that she had for us.
She also showed us how delicious fiends\ncan be, and helped us relax a little.
Yeah, she's done a ton for us,\nbut how do WE help HER?
The hope from another world!\nThe thing that will save Pecorine!
Is this rice? The grains are almost\ntransparent, yet so vibrant...
Ah, of course! She mentioned a special\nkind of rice she used to harvest once.\nI believe she called it princess rice?
Okay, but what exactly are we supposed\nto do with a bunch of rice? Hmm...
Oh no, you sound sad...\nDid I make the wrong wish?
Okay, wait. Didn't Pecorine once say that\nfood is the source of all life?
Cleo, I know she's unconscious, but is\nthere any way she could eat something?
I have been able to provide her water,\nbut I don't think she can chew.
I think what's happened is that Pecorine\nhas been completely drained of energy.
Now that you mention it, she does always\nget terribly hungry after a battle.
So if we restore her lost energy with a\nnutritious rice porridge...
She might recover! Let's add some\nother ingredients as well, to make it\nas nutritious as possible.
Well, we can start by grinding in a bunch\nof medicinal herbs—we actually used to\ndo that all the time back in Hinomoto.
'Course, we barely HAVE any herbs,\nbut I guess it's a start.
...But we DO have plenty of fiends!
Heh. We had the same reaction at first,\nbut we've come around during this trip.
Pecorine gave us all sorts of ideas on how\nto cook and prepare them, so we know\nexactly what we're doing.
It sounds like we're going hunting, then.\nLumière Pandora, please stay here\nand watch over Pecorine.
This'll be the best rice porridge\nPecorine's ever had!
